page.title: 09HOMES FOR THE ELDERLY
page.content: is full but they only had 28 at that time. The home has been an old peoples home for over 20 years. It was a convalescent home before. Only 1 person did not like living in Walton. 1 person could go out of the home for walks. Most of them did not have visitors very often. 1 had them once a month. MEAD HOUSE Mead House was opened 11 years ago. There are 37 people living there at the moment,but it can hold up to 40 people,each living in individual flats.They cater for themselves but the warden is there just in case an accident occurs.We asked questions such as,how long the people had lived there,where they lived before,how often they had visitors and,did they like Walton.We found that most people
